title: 2-year-old shoots mom in arm on SW Side
content:
A mother was shot in the arm by her child on the Southwest Side Monday morning.
The woman said she noticed the child, about 2 years old, had the weapon and tried to grab it. The gun discharged, hitting the woman in the arm.
She was hit in the arm and taken to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries, according to Pima County Sheriff's Deputy Cody Gress
The shooting took place in the 6700 block of West Copperwood Way, near Camino Verde and Valencia.
Pima County Sheriff's Department said officers are investigating, but that no charges had been filed.
